file_insights.details: Replaced CSS `right` property with `insetInlineEnd` for RTL/LTR layout support in StarIcon component styling
file_insights.impact: Improves internationalization (i18n) support by using logical CSS properties that automatically adjust based on text direction

patterns_discovered.description: Systematic replacement of physical CSS properties (right, left) with logical equivalents (insetInlineEnd, insetInlineStart)
patterns_discovered.purpose: Ensures proper layout mirroring for RTL languages without requiring separate CSS overrides
patterns_discovered.context: Part of broader codebase internationalization effort

patterns_discovered.description: Minimal, focused changes targeting specific positioning properties within MUI sx prop objects
patterns_discovered.efficiency: High - changes are isolated and low-risk

gotchas_discovered.description: Must use correct logical property names: `insetInlineEnd` (not `insetEnd` or `right`)
gotchas_discovered.context: CSS Logical Properties specification requires precise naming

approach_outcome.description: Successfully migrated ContactsPage to use logical CSS properties
approach_outcome.completion: First attempt successful - no iteration required
approach_outcome.testing_confidence: high - change is purely presentational and contained

recommendations.rationale: This approach is working well and maintainable; apply same pattern to remaining pages
Create developer documentation mapping physical properties to logical equivalents for future migration tasks
Add ESLint rules to flag usage of physical positioning properties (right, left) in favor of logical properties
